import React from 'react' import '../styles/Header.css' function Header() { window.addEventListener('scroll', () => { const header = document.getElementsById('main-header') const scrollPos = window.scrollY; if (scrollPos > 10) { header.classList.add('scrolled') } else { header.classList.remove('scrolled') } }) return (
